Container.Name: Smuxi
Container.Description: Smuxi is an irssi-inspired, flexible, user-friendly and cross-platform IRC client for sophisticated users.[br][br] Smuxi is based on the client-server model: The core application (engine) can[br] be placed onto a server which is connected to the Internet around-the-clock;[br] one or more frontends then connect to the core. This way, the connection to[br] IRC can be kept up even when all frontends have been closed. The combination[br] of screen and irssi served as example for this architecture.[br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : set this path to where you wish Smuxi to store it's configuration.[br]
